item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:35, so let's meet about 7 right inside the ticket lobby.

Hope to see you Tuesday!

--Dana


OLD STUFF:
I'm not an anime fan, but this movie (directed by M. Night Shamalyan) looks like it's gonna rock, plotwise and effectswise. Come check out the little kid who'd kick all of our butts if we crossed to the Dark Side!

NOTE: We'll see the 3D version of this one, seeing as how I think it'll be worth it. So the tix are $11 each, not $8.

SUMMARY:
Air, Water, Earth, Fire. Four nations tied by destiny when the Fire Nation launches a brutal war against the others. A century has passed with no hope in sight to change the path of this destruction. Caught between combat and courage, Aang discovers he is the lone Avatar with the power to manipulate all four elements. Aang teams with Katara, a Waterbender, and her brother Sokka to restore balance to their war-torn world.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($11.00 each for FMM members and their guests, since this is a 3D movie). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for The Last Airbender!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: The Last Airbender in 3D
